Room.Name: Melbourne Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Melbourne Avenue, east of the Melbourne Arena.
Room.LongDescription: The entrance to the Melbourne Entertainment Arena is located on the south side of the facility off of Nagaritha Drive. On the east side of the road, you can see The Healing Hand, a small-time hospital facility that aids the physically injured in any way they can. Melbourne Avenue continues through the southeastern portion of town to the north and south.
